message: The arena turns pitch black and nobody can see a thing!

outcomes.message: {victim} trip[Vs|] on a rock and falls off a cliff!
{victim} accidentally make[Vs|] contact with spiny, lethal plant life!
{attacker} flail[As|] their weapon around, accidentally killing {victim}!
{attacker} find[As|] and kill[As|] {victim}, who [Vwas|were] making too much noise!
While fighting, {victim} lose their balance, roll down a jagged hillside, and die!
